name: Monica CRM Tool
natural_language_description: 这是 Monica CRM Tool 节点。主要用于: Consume the Monica CRM API

descriptionType.name: descriptionType
descriptionType.natural_language_description: 参数名: Tool Description | 默认值: auto
available_options: Set Automatically (值: auto) - Automatically set based on resource and operation
Set Manually (值: manual) - Manually set the description

toolDescription.name: toolDescription
toolDescription.description: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often
toolDescription.natural_language_description: 参数名: Description | 作用: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often | 默认值: Consume the Monica CRM API | (必填项)

resource.name: resource
resource.natural_language_description: 参数名: Resource | 默认值: contact

operation.name: operation
operation.natural_language_description: 参数名: Operation | 默认值: create
available_options: Get Many (值: getAll) - Retrieve many tasks

activityTypeId.name: activityTypeId
activityTypeId.description: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression
activityTypeId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Activity Type Name or ID | 作用: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression | (必填项)

contacts.name: contacts
contacts.description: Comma-separated list of IDs of the contacts to associate the activity with
contacts.natural_language_description: 参数名: Contacts | 作用: Comma-separated list of IDs of the contacts to associate the activity with | (必填项)

happenedAt.name: happenedAt
happenedAt.natural_language_description: 参数名: Happened At | 作用: Date when the conversation happened | (必填项)

summary.name: summary
summary.description: Brief description of the activity - max 255 characters
summary.natural_language_description: 参数名: Summary | 作用: Brief description of the activity - max 255 characters | (必填项)

additionalFields.name: additionalFields
additionalFields.natural_language_description: 参数名: Additional Fields | 默认值: {}
available_options: description (值: None) - Description of the task - max 100,000 characters

activityId.name: activityId
activityId.description: ID of the activity to update
activityId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Activity ID | 作用: ID of the activity to update | (必填项)

returnAll.name: returnAll
returnAll.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit
returnAll.natural_language_description: 参数名: Return All | 作用: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit | 默认值: False

limit.name: limit
limit.description: Max number of results to return
limit.natural_language_description: 参数名: Limit | 作用: Max number of results to return | 默认值: 50

updateFields.name: updateFields
updateFields.natural_language_description: 参数名: Update Fields | 默认值: {}
available_options: contactId (值: None) - ID of the contact to associate the task with
completed (值: None) - Whether the task has been completed
description (值: None) - Description of the task - max 100,000 characters
title (值: None) - Title of the task entry - max 250 characters

contactId.name: contactId
contactId.description: ID of the contact to associate the task with
contactId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Contact ID | 作用: ID of the contact to associate the task with | (必填项)

calledAt.name: calledAt
calledAt.natural_language_description: 参数名: Called At | 作用: Date when the call happened | (必填项)

content.name: content
content.natural_language_description: 参数名: Content | 作用: Content of the message | (必填项)

callId.name: callId
callId.description: ID of the call to update
callId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Call ID | 作用: ID of the call to update | (必填项)

firstName.name: firstName
firstName.natural_language_description: 参数名: First Name | (必填项)

genderId.name: genderId
genderId.description: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression
genderId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Gender Name or ID | 作用: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression | (必填项)

filters.name: filters
filters.natural_language_description: 参数名: Filters | 默认值: {}
available_options: query (值: None) - Search term to filter results by

contactFieldTypeId.displayName: Contact Field Type Name or ID
contactFieldTypeId.name: contactFieldTypeId
contactFieldTypeId.description: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression
contactFieldTypeId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Contact Field Type Name or ID | 作用: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression | (必填项)

data.name: data
data.description: Content of the contact field - max 255 characters
data.natural_language_description: 参数名: Content | 作用: Content of the contact field - max 255 characters | (必填项)

contactFieldId.name: contactFieldId
contactFieldId.description: ID of the contact field to update
contactFieldId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Contact Field ID | 作用: ID of the contact field to update | (必填项)

tagsToAdd.name: tagsToAdd
tagsToAdd.description: Tags to add to the contact. Choose from the list, or specify IDs using an expression.
tagsToAdd.natural_language_description: 参数名: Tag Names or IDs | 作用: Tags to add to the contact. Choose from the list, or specify IDs using an expression. | 默认值: [] | (必填项)

tagsToRemove.name: tagsToRemove
tagsToRemove.description: Tags to remove from the contact. Choose from the list, or specify IDs using an expression.
tagsToRemove.natural_language_description: 参数名: Tag Names or IDs | 作用: Tags to remove from the contact. Choose from the list, or specify IDs using an expression. | 默认值: [] | (必填项)

conversationId.name: conversationId
conversationId.description: ID of the conversation whose message to update
conversationId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Conversation ID | 作用: ID of the conversation whose message to update | (必填项)

writtenAt.name: writtenAt
writtenAt.description: Date when the message was written
writtenAt.natural_language_description: 参数名: Written At | 作用: Date when the message was written | (必填项)

writtenByMe.name: writtenByMe
writtenByMe.natural_language_description: 参数名: Written By | 作用: Author of the message | 默认值: True | (必填项)

messageId.name: messageId
messageId.description: ID of the message to update
messageId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Message ID | 作用: ID of the message to update | (必填项)

title.name: title
title.description: Title of the task entry - max 250 characters
title.natural_language_description: 参数名: Title | 作用: Title of the task entry - max 250 characters | (必填项)

post.name: post
post.description: Content of the journal entry - max 100,000 characters
post.natural_language_description: 参数名: Content | 作用: Content of the journal entry - max 100,000 characters | (必填项)

journalId.name: journalId
journalId.description: ID of the journal entry to update
journalId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Journal Entry ID | 作用: ID of the journal entry to update | (必填项)

body.name: body
body.description: Body of the note - max 100,000 characters
body.natural_language_description: 参数名: Body | 作用: Body of the note - max 100,000 characters | (必填项)

noteId.name: noteId
noteId.description: ID of the note to update
noteId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Note ID | 作用: ID of the note to update | (必填项)

frequencyType.name: frequencyType
frequencyType.description: Type of frequency of the reminder
frequencyType.natural_language_description: 参数名: Frequency Type | 作用: Type of frequency of the reminder | 默认值: one_time | (必填项)

frequencyNumber.name: frequencyNumber
frequencyNumber.natural_language_description: 参数名: Recurring Interval | 作用: Interval for the reminder | 默认值: 0

initialDate.name: initialDate
initialDate.natural_language_description: 参数名: Initial Date | 作用: Date of the reminder | (必填项)

reminderId.name: reminderId
reminderId.description: ID of the reminder to update
reminderId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Reminder ID | 作用: ID of the reminder to update | (必填项)

name.name: name
name.description: Name of the tag - max 250 characters
name.natural_language_description: 参数名: Name | 作用: Name of the tag - max 250 characters | (必填项)

tagId.name: tagId
tagId.description: ID of the tag to update
tagId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Tag ID | 作用: ID of the tag to update | (必填项)

taskId.name: taskId
taskId.description: ID of the task to update
taskId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Task ID | 作用: ID of the task to update | (必填项)
